titleStmt.title: The secrets and wonders of the world A booke right rare and straunge, containing many excellent properties, giuen to man, beastes, foules, fishes and serpents, trees, plants &c. Abstracted out of that excellent naturall historiographer Plinie. Translated out of French into English.
Naturalis historia. English. Abridgments
titleStmt.author: Pliny, the Elder.
Alday, John, attributed name.
I. A.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Henry Denham] for Thomas Hacket, are are to be solde at his shop in Lumberd streete, vnder the Popes head,

notesStmt.note: A translation of Pierre de Changy's French abstract of Pliny's "Naturalis historia". A previous edition (STC 20031) had translator's initials I.A., i.e. John Alday?.
Running title reads: Secrets and wonders of the worlde.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Lumberd streete, vnder the Popes head
